## ConnectPlugin.process() method

CLI invokes this method for each component in the configration file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
process(componentConfig: ComponentConfig): Promise<ComponentData>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  componentConfig | <code>ComponentConfig</code> | [ComponentConfig](./cli.componentconfig.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<ComponentData>`
